channel.title: How do i add a radio to my client?
channel.description:
well i was wondering how it is done i know its possibly to do it because i know 1 server that has it and while your in the game on the client you type /radioon and /radiooff
please if you know how pm me, post here or contact me on msn
MSN = Googlescape@hotmail.com
